text: Is it weird to plan on committing suicide by a certain age date goal My boyfriend and I are in the process of home buying and considering our financials  We got on the topic of me taking my old well paying job back up while attending school full time  I was working graveyard full time and doing school full time before  and he feared for my health now and down the road so I quit   When I brought up taking my old job back  he was adamant about if I did  he d set up a strict schedule of sleeping and school for me to adhere to in order to attempt to reduce my odds at getting dementia later in life  I responded with the fact that I don t plan on really living past  s  if I even felt like getting to that age in the first place   I honestly have nothing I feel I truly live for or want to live for  I m just kind of here and giving my all to things like school and family and friends  but I don t feel particularly fulfilled  I have happy moments  but I ve just always wanted to die  I wanted to cause I hated my life growing up with emotionally abusive parents  depression  suicidal ideations previous attempts  and loneliness  but just generally now I m carrying on until I feel I ve had my fill and then I m done   He wanted to bet on it  Saying he guarantees I ll change my mind  I told him sure  it doesn t matter to me  cause the older I get  the sooner I want to die but I haven t decided exactly when  just a general goal frame  but I definitely don t plan on getting old and decrepit  He was visibly and audibly upset  but didn t express any of it more in words to me other than the bet   Honestly  I m not gonna lie and say  yeah sure I ll grow old with you and we can die together when we re super elderly  when I just really am pretty set on living life the way I want to as best as I can and ending it on my own terms as well
